main event: Control tower operators at Laredo Air Force Base in Texas observed a bright, fast-moving, unidentified object in the sky on multiple occasions in 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared to be cylindrical in shape and had a bright glow around it.
The object moved at a very high speed and was difficult to estimate the altitude, but was thought to be around 4,000 feet.
The object would appear, pause, and then rapidly disappear from sight.
Pilots of nearby aircraft were asked if they had seen the object, but they had not.
The observers were certain the object was not a known type of aircraft.
sighted object: a bright, fast-moving, cylindrical object with a glow
